projects.title: Tripic
projects.subtitle: We make your Trip terrific!
projects.description: Tripic is an image recognition application that helps lost travelers identify what's around them.

projects.title: Chatty: The Chatbot
projects.subtitle: A UX Design case study
projects.description: A Chatbot is essentially a program that interacts with users and addresses their needs through a text messaging platform.

projects.title: HRM Web App
projects.subtitle: Resource management tool
projects.description: HRM is an online tool to assist HR, Training, recruitment, and engineering management teams in monitoring and managing skills and competencies in an organization.

projects.title: Medcords
projects.subtitle: Organize your medical data
projects.description: Medcords is a healthcare platform to help organize all medical history of an individual and their family in rural and urban areas.

projects.title: YourPhysio
projects.subtitle: A patient-centric approach transforming physiotherapy care
projects.description: YourPhyiso aims at building a chain of model physiotherapy clinics using process driven procedures.

projects.title: TasKey
projects.subtitle: A Task Management Application
projects.description: A group process automation project aiming to manage all workflows in or across teams.
